amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to delete language which provides for mandatory minimum sentences and the death penalty in certain circumstances for violent crimes against children.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of amendments numbered 4 and 7 printed in the Congressional Record offerd en bloc.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendments (A012) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments (A012) offered by Mr. Scott (VA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendments (A012) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
